title: Damn Yankees
description: (Vocal Score). Ross & Adler's 1955 Broadway production which won a Tony Award for Best Musical featured Gwen Verdon. Our vocal score includes 12 The Game * Goodbye, Old Girl * Heart * A Little Brains, a Little Talent * A Man Doesn't Know * Near to You * Shoeless Joe from Hannibal, Mo. * Six Months Out of the Year * Those Were the Good Old Days! * Two Lost Souls * Whatever Lola Wants (Lola Gets) * Who's Got the Pain?
author: Richard Adler
